Extreme Low Breakage.recommendation: Maintain your current routine, as your hair shows very minimal breakage. Continue with gentle handling and protective styling.

Low Breakage.recommendation: Slight breakage is normal. Use leave-in conditioners and avoid excessive heat styling to strengthen hair further.

Medium Breakage.recommendation: Moderate breakage detected. Increase moisturizing treatments and use protein masks weekly to rebuild strength.

High Breakage.recommendation: Hair is experiencing significant breakage. Reduce manipulation, avoid chemical treatments, and trim split ends regularly.

Extreme High Breakage.recommendation: Severe breakage present. Consult a trichologist or dermatologist. Implement an intensive repair regimen with deep conditioning and protective styles.
